projects.title: Bright burn
projects.description: A 2D action fighting game built with unity
projects.details: Bright Burn** was a 3-month university senior project where I developed a game solo using Unity. I was responsible for programming the character and game logic, as well as designing the overall game experience.

projects.title: Sacrilegious Invasion
projects.description: A 3D shooter built in Unity for a game jam
projects.details: Developed during a one-week game jam as part of a team. I was responsible for programming core gameplay systems, including player movement, shooting mechanics, enemy AI, and health systems. Collaborated with teammates on level layout and rapid iteration under tight time constraints.

projects.title: Game Development Projects
projects.description: Check out the rest of my game development projects

projects.title: The Waywards
projects.description: A Website for uploading short stories
projects.details: Using react router i developed a website for uploading short stories. The website is built with React and uses Payload CMS for content management, allowing me to create, edit, and manage their stories easily.
